subject: Dear Beloved Calvin,
body:
Dear Beloved Calvin,

I am happy to receive your response and May the good Lord almighty bless
you beyond your human comprehension. I am Mrs. Isabella Mario and I am a
Spanish woman and I live here in Spain and I am currently hospitalized for
breast cancer illness. I understand that you know that millions of children
around the world have been deprived of the warm, tender touch of a loving
mother and the serene care of a father. In the younger innocent and playful
stage, these children were forced to mature quickly pushing adulthood for
survival because there was no parental guidance, and in many cases, they
took care of their younger siblings. My plan is to see that this money is
used for charity, to help orphans, widows, and the less fortunate people in
society.

Having known my condition, I have decided to donate this fund to orphanages
because I was touched by the afflictions of the less privileged to donate
what I have inherited from my late husband to you for the good work of the
charity.

Currently, I am seriously sick and I do not want to abandon this money in
the bank vault and that is the reason I decided to donate this fund to you
so that you will help me set up a charity organization where the needy will
benefit from life struggles. If you accept my proposal and indicate
interest in helping me build a charity organization with these funds, I
will officially and legally introduce you to the bank for the fund transfer
and I'll also sign a power of attorney certificate in your name.

I want you to send me the following information to enable me to sign a
power of attorney certificate on your behalf to the bank for the fund
transfer to you;

1) Your names
2) Home or office
3) Your direct phone number
4) Nationality
5) Occupation

Please send me your details as soon as you receive this message so that I
can sign the power of attorney on your behalf to allow the fund transfer to
your bank account.

Currently, this fund is still in the vault of the Bank and I need you to
help me and act according to my desire and dreams in the development of a
charity organization. My purpose is to help relieve poverty by providing
items needed by the homeless or those on a low income.

I expect to hear from you.

Your sister

Mrs. Isabella Mario.
